content: Combat sport events in 2022 ***ONE: Heavy Hitters*** (also known as ***ONE 150: Xiong vs. Miura***) was a [Combat sport](/wiki/Combat_sport) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on January 14, 2022, at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background The event was headlined by a [ONE Women's Strawweight World Championship](/wiki/ONE_Women%27s_Strawweight_World_Championship) bout between current Champion [Xiong Jingnan](/wiki/Xiong_Jingnan) and Ayaka Miura. A [ONE Light Heavyweight Kickboxing World Championship](/wiki/ONE_Light_Heavyweight_Kickboxing_World_Championship) bout between current champion [Roman Kryklia](/wiki/Roman_Kryklia) and [Murat Aygün](/wiki/Murat_Ayg%C3%BCn) was expected to take place at the event. The two were originally scheduled to fight at ONE Championship: Big Bang last year. However, in turn, Aygün has to withdraw on January 12 due to [COVID-19](/wiki/COVID-19), the bout was cancelled for the second time. Filipino fighter Jeremy Miado and Robin Catalan will not be taking part in the upcoming event due to [COVID-19](/wiki/COVID-19_pandemic). The pinoys opponents will thus face each other instead. Catalan, will return to action after a year against Elipitua Siregar on the card. ## Results Main card (YouTube / ONE Super App)Weight classMethodRoundTimeNotesWomen's Strawweight[Xiong Jing Nan](/wiki/Xiong_Jing_Nan) (c)def.Ayaka MiuraDecision (unanimous)55:00[a]Catchweight (146.4 lbs) Muay Thai[Tawanchai P.K.Saenchai](/wiki/Tawanchai_P.K._Saenchaimuaythaigym)def.[Saemapetch Fairtex](/wiki/Saemapetch_Fairtex)KO (punches)12:55[b]LightweightSaygid Izagakhmaevdef.James NakashimaSubmission (D'Arce choke)22:17Women's Strawweight Muay ThaiSupergirl Jarronsakdef.[Ekaterina Vandaryeva](/wiki/Ekaterina_Vandaryeva)Decision (split)33:00StrawweightSenzo Ikedadef.Elipitua SiregarKO (punch to the body)32:00Light Heavyweight Kickboxing[Giannis Stoforidis](/wiki/Giannis_Stoforidis)def.[Beybulat Isaev](/wiki/Beybulat_Isaev)KO (punch)10:31Lead card (YouTube / Facebook / ONE Super App)Women's StrawweightTiffany Teodef.Meng BoSubmission (rear-naked choke)23:45BantamweightShuya Kamikubodef.Troy WorthenSubmission (rear-naked choke)34:36 ## Bonus awards The following fighters received $50,000 bonuses. - **Performance of the Night: Senzo Ikeda, Ekaterina Vandaryeva** and **Saygid Izagakhmaev** - Martial Arts portal - [2022 in ONE Championship](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship) - [List of ONE Championship events](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_events) - [List of current ONE fighters](/wiki/List_of_current_ONE_fighters)
title: ONE: Heavy Hitters
